name: AdBlocker
author: tetra#0001, Xavi
description: Removes the carousels from the quick menu & VRC+ UI elements.
changelog:
* Remove VRC+ related UI elements
* Add preference entries for each element

name: CalibrateConfirm
author: tetra#0001
description: Adds a confirmation prompt when you click calibrate, in the case that you've accidentally clicked calibrate and don't want to stand up to recalibrate your avatar.
changelog:
* Fixed scaling issue (hopefully, I haven't seen it happen since updating)
* Prompt length is now configurable
* Prompt can be enabled for the settings tab calibrate button

name: ProPlates
author: tetra#0001
description:
Gets a player's pronouns from their status/bio then displays them under their nameplate.

If you'd like to manually set your pronouns, check the [**README**](https://github.com/tetra-fox/VRCMods/tree/master/ProPlates) for instructions.
changelog: * Major internal changes, use new PlateAPI

name: QMFreeze
author: tetra#0001
description: Freezes your avatar when you open the quick menu, in case you're falling/moving too fast and can't click anything on the quick menu.
changelog: * Minor internal change, use new ML Logger

name: UnmuteSound
author: tetra#0001
description: Plays a higher pitched *blop* sound when unmuting your microphone.
changelog: * Minor internal change, use new ML Logger
